translation.es: ¡Alfa! El paquete se dirige hacia ustedes.

translation.en: Move it, move it, move, move, move!
Alpha, be advised, hostages on board. I repeat, hostages on board.
translation.es: Alpha, hay rehenes a bordo. Repito, hay rehenes.

translation.en: Do you copy? Use non- lethal force only, hostages on board.
translation.es: ¿Me recibes? No tiren a matar. Hay rehenes a bordo. Dame la ubicación. Entendido.

translation.en: Amina, where do you come from?
Why did you put my bag on the ground?
translation.es: ¿Por qué arrojaste mi bolso al suelo?

translation.en: I don't like the way you are taking gifts from this man.
translation.es: No me gusta que aceptes los regalos de este hombre.

translation.en: I've told you already that he will not marry Amina.
translation.es: Ya te dije que no se casará con Amina.

translation.en: I only see what is better for her.
translation.es: Intento que ella tenga lo mejor.

translation.en: The goat I tied here yesterday.
Mother, look, it's too early for that.
translation.es: Mamá, mira, aún es muy temprano.

translation.en: Ahba! Look at how we suffer on this compound.
translation.es: Querido, mira cómo sufrimos en este complejo.

translation.en: You are meant to be our savior.
Ahba! Don't you feel pity for us?
Everyone treats me like a leper in my father's house.
translation.es: Me tratan como a un leproso en casa de mi padre.

translation.en: Who treats you like a leper more than yourself?
translation.es: Eres tú mismo quien se trata como tal.

translation.en: And when day breaks, you do absolutely nothing
translation.es: Y cuando amanece, no haces nada

translation.en: Someone should tell this useless man the truth.
translation.es: Alguien debería decirle la verdad a este inútil.

translation.en: You are very lucky today. I would've hit you.
translation.es: Hoy tuviste suerte. Te habría golpeado.

translation.en: - It was fine. - Why are you following me?
Don't talk about that goat with me.
translation.es: No me hables de esa cabra.

translation.en: Rukaya. She wants to see you.
She's the woman getting jobs for our little ones in Burkina and beyond.
translation.es: Esta mujer les consigue trabajo a los pequeños en Burkina y más allá.

translation.en: But I told you I'm thinking about it.
translation.es: Pero te dije que lo estoy pensando.

translation.en: Eh, what is there to think about?
Look at Amina. What can you give her in this town?
translation.es: Mira a Amina. ¿Qué le puedes dar en este pueblo?

translation.en: Rukaya, I promise you, if you don't listen to me, you are on your own.
translation.es: Rukaya, si no me haces caso, te quedarás sola.

translation.en: Don't worry, you will take Amina soon. Mm?
translation.es: No te preocupes, pronto te llevarás a Amina, ¿sí?

translation.en: You better think fast. You better think fast.
My sister, I will leave now.
Rukaya, do you think you are better than all the other mothers
translation.es: Rukaya, ¿te crees mejor que todas las demás madres

translation.en: who have sent their children away?
translation.es: que enviaron lejos a sus hijos?

translation.en: - Have you see one before? - Auntie Lamisi.
translation.es: - ¿Ya habías visto a alguien así? - La tía Lamisi.
No creas todo lo que oyes...

translation.en: if you want to be fifth.
I had some time on my hands and I decided to pass by and say hello.
translation.es: Tenía un rato y pensé en pasarme a saludar.

translation.en: May God give us good health.
translation.es: Que Dios nos dé buena salud.

translation.en: Amina. Get inside. Don't come out.
Rukaya. We were waiting for you. Have a seat.
Baba. You were my father's friend.
translation.es: Baba, eras amigo de mi padre.

translation.en: Yes. That's why I want to take care of your daughter.
translation.es: Sí. Por eso quiero cuidar a tu hija.

translation.en: Aren't you ashamed of yourself? Going after your friend's granddaughter?
translation.es: ¿No te da vergüenza ir tras la nieta de tu amigo?

translation.en: Is it because we are poor?
If you had listened to me,
Alhaji Dauda would've been your husband by now.
translation.es: Alhaji Dauda habría sido tu esposo.

translation.en: And went after that useless boy
Do you want Amina to end up like you?
Mama. I want better for her.
translation.es: Mamá, quiero algo mejor para ella.

translation.en: Oh. She says I should leave?
So you think sending her to some strange land will solve our problems.
translation.es: Así que crees que enviarla a una tierra extraña resolverá nuestros problemas.

translation.en: Mama. Any option is better than becoming a fourth wife.
translation.es: Mamá, cualquier opción es mejor que ser la cuarta esposa.

translation.en: Since when did my opinion matter in this house?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo importa mi opinión en esta casa?

translation.en: Is that all you can say?
I have to get to the market.
Your mother loves you. She will never allow any harm to come to you.
translation.es: Tu madre te quiere y nunca dejará que sufras ningún daño.

translation.en: You are a child no more.
Talk to your mother before you go. Do you hear?
translation.es: Habla con tu madre antes de irte. ¿Oíste?
- No, no lo haré. - Por favor.

translation.en: - Do you hear? - No, I won't.
We have to pick up the last person quickly.
translation.es: Debemos recoger a la última persona.

translation.en: So by dawn we should've left.
What you said is right. Now we have gathered them.
translation.es: Lo que dijiste es verdad. - Los hemos reunido. - Sí.

translation.en: So what we're supposed to do now is...
What are you doing here? Huh?
Do you know why you are here?
Huh? What are you doing here?
Listen, you are going to be sold.
And you won't come back again. Huh?
Calm down. I must find a way... to get you out of here.
translation.es: Tranquila. Encontraré la forma de sacarte de aquí.

translation.en: Madam, this girl, she is very stubborn and disobedient.
translation.es: Señora, esta niña es muy testaruda y desobediente.

translation.en: Calm down, OK? Hmm? You will be fine.
You'll be fine, OK? You'll be fine.
Don't mind him, OK? Stop crying, OK?
translation.es: No le hagas caso y deja de llorar.

translation.en: Is everyone done with the work?
Hmm... Everyone is done, except Yussif.
We can't have the kids agitated now.
translation.es: No podemos permitir que se inquieten los niños.

translation.en: This is going to be your temporary home until we can send each of you home.
translation.es: Este será su hogar temporal hasta que podamos enviarlos a casa.

translation.en: How do we get food to eat?
They loaded the harvest this afternoon.
I've gone there two times today so this is our last chance
translation.es: Hoy fui dos veces. Es la última oportunidad.

translation.en: If we miss it again, we have to wait for the next harvest.
translation.es: Si volvemos a fallar, deberemos esperar a la próxima cosecha.

translation.en: - We won't. - And what about money?
You are always sad. My name is Seidu.
translation.es: Siempre estás triste. Me llamo Seidu.

translation.en: My home... I couldn't remember it.
translation.es: Yo ni siquiera recuerdo mi hogar.

translation.en: - Do you remember your parents? - I don't want to.
They gave me to people for money!
- Where are you going? - We're running away.
Hey! Fuseini. Start the vehicle, I'm in a hurry.
translation.es: ¡Oye, Fuseini! Arranca el vehículo, tengo prisa.

translation.en: I'II be away for five days. So take care of the farm.
translation.es: Me iré cinco días. Cuida la granja.

translation.en: Why haven't you started the car yet?
- You've got it now? - Just like I want it.
translation.es: - ¿Ya lo tienes? - Como a mí me gusta.

translation.en: Fuseini. I suspect there are people in the truck. Open it and let's see.
translation.es: Creo que hay gente ahí dentro. Abre y veamos.

translation.en: There are people in the truck. Open it properly.
translation.es: Hay gente en el camión. Abre bien.

translation.en: What are you doing in the truck? I said what are you doing in the truck!
translation.es: ¿Qué hacen en el camión? - ¿Qué hacen? - Baba, podemos explicarlo.

translation.en: Baba, we're sorry, we only needed to escape and you know how long
some of us have been there and we've no money.
translation.es: Algunos llevamos mucho tiempo ahí y no tenemos dinero.

translation.en: Look here, Fuseini. Start the truck and let's return.
translation.es: Fuseini, arranca el camión y regresemos.

translation.en: Baba, please, we can't go back.
translation.es: - Baba, por favor, no podemos volver. - Por favor, no nos hagas regresar.

translation.en: What do I get out of this?
Baba, we help you sell faster. In exchange for the transport money.
translation.es: Te ayudaremos a vender más rápido a cambio del dinero del transporte.

translation.en: It's OK. Because of the offer.
Let me give you this one.
- Thank you, Baba. - I should be thanking you people.
translation.es: - Gracias, Baba. - Agradécele a tu gente.

translation.en: Do you want to cause problems for me? Ah.
No. I said we were running away.
translation.es: No. Dije que íbamos a huir.

translation.en: Your mother doesn't want you home without money. So follow us to Accra.
translation.es: Tu madre no te quiere en casa sin dinero. Acompáñanos a Accra.

translation.en: So how much is my share?
So why does your grandmother want you to marry the old man?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tu abuela quiere que te cases con el viejo?

translation.en: So, it's good you didn't go.
translation.es: Me alegra que no hayas ido.

translation.en: My mother can protect me. I just want her to know I'm OK.
translation.es: Mi madre puede protegerme. Quiero que sepa que estoy bien.

translation.en: As we're in Accra now, you'll be fine.
translation.es: Ya estamos en Accra, estarás bien.

translation.en: Wow! Look at the big gate.
- Wow, this place is nice. - Oh, look at the flowers.
translation.es: - Este lugar me gusta. - Miren las flores.

translation.en: Wow, they're nice. Look at the beautiful building.
We'll get off at the last stop.
translation.es: Nos bajamos en la última parada.

translation.en: I was as young as you when I came to the city.
translation.es: Era tan joven como tú cuando vine a la ciudad.

translation.en: Things are difficult for people who come here for the first time.
translation.es: Para los recién llegados, todo es más difícil.

translation.en: But later, it will be OK.
Have you seen what you've done?
You are a hard woker. I will introduce you to my boss.
translation.es: Eres muy trabajador. Te presentaré a mi jefe.

translation.en: When you finish work, we can go to my boss.
translation.es: Cuando termines de trabajar, iremos con mi jefe.

translation.en: I like the way you work. I will take you to him, OK?
translation.es: Me gusta tu trabajo. Te llevaré con él.

translation.en: We must find my Amina, we must find her.
You have to go to Accra.
Me? Why me? I won't go.
translation.es: ¿Por qué yo? No voy a ir.

translation.en: And take care of Mama. I will go.
I'm going to look for Amina.
What could she be doing now?
Have it, that's all I have, OK.
translation.es: Toma, es todo lo que tengo.

translation.en: - It's not enough. - I'll top it up next week.
translation.es: - No es suficiente. - Te daré el resto la semana que viene.

translation.en: - I'll be on my way. - OK, thank you.

translation.es: Que Dios te ayude con las ventas.

translation.en: - Please help her carry it. - Hurry up.
translation.es: - Por favor, ayúdale a cargarlo. - Date prisa.
Si Dios quiere, la próxima semana.

translation.en: Stop what you're doing and give us the money.
translation.es: Deja eso y danos el dinero.

translation.en: Is that the way to take money from someone?
translation.es: ¿Esa es forma de quitarle dinero a alguien?

translation.en: I've been looking for you everywhere.
translation.es: Te he buscado por todas partes.

translation.en: OK, ask for the boss's place in the yam market.
translation.es: Pregunta por el jefe en el mercado de batatas.

translation.en: Hey, head porter. Ah! Let's go, what are you doing there?
translation.es: Oye, la de la cesta en la cabeza. Vamos, ¿qué haces?

translation.en: I don't care, give us the money.
translation.es: No me importa, danos el dinero.

translation.en: You told me to come so you'll help me.
translation.es: Dijiste que viniera y que me ayudarías.

translation.en: - Have you been drinking? - I'm busy.
Busy doing what, smoking and drinking?
I need to fit in, or else they'll throw me out.
- What do you want? - You said you'd help me.
Have you started looking for her?
You don't know what people are going through in this city.
translation.es: No conoces a la gente de esta ciudad.

translation.en: But I have to survive first.
So... What work do you do now?
I live there with my daughter, Esther.
translation.es: Vivo allí con mi hija, Esther.

translation.en: - Good afternoon. - Afternoon. How was school?
Go inside and change and come back.
You know what? Go and wash the things.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Ve a lavar las cosas.

translation.en: - How are you doing? - Do you care?
I'm sorry for the other day.
OK, but you have to be careful, don't forget why you're here.
translation.es: Bueno, pero ten cuidado. No olvides por qué estás aquí.

translation.en: Yes, madam! My small girl is now my madam.
translation.es: ¡Sí, señora! La pequeña es ahora mi jefa.

translation.en: Ooh... Really? It's like that, huh?
Amina, listen, I want you to be my friend.
translation.es: Amina, escucha, quiero que seas mi amiga.

translation.en: Look, I want you to be my girlfriend. I like you.
translation.es: Bueno, quiero que seas mi novia. Me gustas.

translation.en: - Erm, no. - Amina, wait, wait, wait...
One hundred cedis just to sleep with me. How about that?
translation.es: Cien cedis para dormir conmigo. ¿Qué te parece?

translation.en: Where is your money? This is the second time this week.
translation.es: ¿Y tu dinero? Es la segunda vez esta semana.

translation.en: You want me to kick you out to the street?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te eche a la calle?

translation.en: Madam, please, tomorrow I'll bring double.
translation.es: Por favor, mañana le traigo doble.

translation.en: You will bring double? It doesn't apply to you alone.
translation.es: ¿El doble? Esto no es solo por ti.

translation.en: You and this girl have not paid anything today.
translation.es: Tú y esta chica no han pagado nada hoy.

translation.en: If you don't bring double by the end of tomorrow,
translation.es: Si no traen el doble mañana a última hora,

translation.en: you will sleep on the street. Foolish girls.
translation.es: dormirán en la calle, chicas tontas.

translation.en: My dear, where is your money?
What is this? Ah. What's wrong with you? Are you crazy?
As from today, the money you will bring each day is 15 cedis.
translation.es: A partir de hoy, cada día pagarás 15 cedis.

translation.en: I will deal with you. It won't be easy if you fail to give me money next time.
translation.es: Ya me ocuparé de ti. No será fácil si no me das dinero la próxima vez.

translation.en: You give money today and fail to give tomorrow.
translation.es: Hoy das dinero y mañana no.

translation.en: This is the kind of lady I like, consistent with her payment.
translation.es: Este es el tipo de mujer que me gusta. Paga siempre puntual.

translation.en: That's why I like you. You pay your money.
translation.es: Por eso me gustas. Pagas siempre.

translation.en: You are unlike these other girls. They're not regular in payment.
translation.es: Eres diferente a las demás, que no pagan con regularidad.

translation.en: Tomorrow I will see you, yeah? See you tomorrow.
translation.es: Te veo mañana. Gracias, hasta mañana.

translation.en: Look at all this money. And the others are failing to pay.
translation.es: Mira todo este dinero. Y las demás no pagan.
No llores. No vuelvas a llorar.

translation.en: OK? You are a woman now.
In this place, it's normal the way people treat you.
translation.es: En este lugar, es normal que la gente te trate así.

translation.en: From today, me and you, we will make good money.
translation.es: A partir de hoy, tú y yo haremos buen dinero.

translation.en: You know you are a beautiful girl.
Watch your face. Tell me something. Smile. Hm?
translation.es: Mira esa cara. Dime algo. Sonríe.

translation.en: I will give them to you for six cedis each
- What type of yams are these? - It's white yam.
OK, how much is it for everything?
You bring what you have and take these away.
translation.es: Tráeme lo que tengas y te lo llevas.

translation.en: Carry the yams and let's go.
translation.es: Carguen las batatas y nos vamos.

translation.en: Serve her, Seidu! Take care of everything.
- Seidu? - Check the boss's room. Thank you.
translation.es: - ¿Seidu? Gracias. - Mira en la habitación del jefe.

translation.en: Please, it's me, I'm looking for Seidu.
translation.es: Soy yo, estoy buscando a Seidu.

translation.en: Sorry. I thought Seidu was here.
translation.es: Lo siento. Pensé que Seidu estaba aquí.

translation.en: Don't go. Seidu will be here soon.
translation.es: No te vayas. Seidu llegará pronto.

translation.en: Why are you looking for Seidu?
I came to tell him that I'm going to my hometown.
translation.es: Vine a decirle que me voy a mi pueblo.

translation.en: I will take care of you.
Wait, let me see if the boss is in there.
translation.es: A ver si el jefe está aquí.

translation.en: Next time you do that, we will kill you.
You do absolutely nothing except sleeping
translation.es: No haces nada más que dormir
- Están tardando mucho. - ¿Por qué tardan tanto? TRES MESES DESPUÉS

translation.en: Don't they know there are people waiting to bathe.
What is it? Who's in there?
Hurry up and get out, your time is up. Madam.
translation.es: Dese prisa, se le acabó el tiempo, señora.

translation.en: You are pregnant! In this house?
How am I going to get my money?
With your pregnancy, you expect me to feed you?
How am I going to get my money every evening?
translation.es: ¿Cómo conseguiré mi dinero todas las noches?

translation.en: You have to abort that bastard.
translation.es: Tienes que abortar a ese bastardo.

translation.en: No babies in this house, that's the rule.
translation.es: En esta casa no puede haber bebés. Es una regla.

translation.en: Go and abort it before I throw you out.
translation.es: Ve a abortar o te echaré.

translation.en: Young girls of your age come here all the time.
translation.es: Las jóvenes de tu edad vienen aquí todo el tiempo.

translation.en: The most complicated ones can be aborted easily.
translation.es: Los más complicados se pueden abortar fácilmente.

translation.en: You won't listen to my advice and you won't comply.
translation.es: No escuchaste mi consejo y no cumpliste.

translation.en: The day you don't bring money again,
translation.es: Si un día no traes mi dinero,

translation.en: that day, I will send you out packing.
Do you hear what I'm saying? Foolish girl.
I now have to go home with bad news.
translation.es: Debo volver a casa con malas noticias.

translation.en: Take the books outside and continue with your homework.
translation.es: Llévate los libros fuera y continúa con tu tarea. Vamos.

translation.en: my husband threw me and Esther out.
translation.es: ...nos echó a Esther y a mí.

translation.en: After seeing Esther off to school,
translation.es: cuando Esther salió para la escuela,

translation.en: I sat on the front porch.
When I turned, it was Esther.
It felt like everything will be alright.
translation.es: Y sentí que todo iba a estar bien.

translation.en: I see you have gone through a lot.
translation.es: Veo que has pasado por muchas cosas.

translation.en: Sister, please, I'm looking for this girl.
translation.es: Hermana, por favor, busco a esta chica.

translation.en: Have you seen this girl anywhere?
I'm looking for this girl, her name is Amina.
translation.es: Estoy buscando a esta chica. Se llama Amina.

translation.en: - Who? - Her name is Amina, I am looking for her.
translation.es: - ¿Quién? - Se llama Amina, la estoy buscando.

translation.en: She is here? She has come here?
- We're looking for her. - Is she a relative?
translation.es: - La estamos buscando. - ¿Es de tu familia?

translation.en: Yeah, we were told she is here.
translation.es: Sí, nos dijeron que está aquí.

translation.en: - Have you been to Kokomba? - Tomorrow we will go there.
translation.es: - ¿Han ido a Kokomba? - Mañana vamos allá.

translation.en: - Have you been to Tema Station? - We are just coming from there.
translation.es: - ¿Fueron a la estación de Tema? - Venimos de ahí.

translation.en: As long as I live under Adiza's roof, I will never go home.
translation.es: Mientras viva bajo el techo de Adiza, nunca volveré a casa.

translation.en: Please, Sister Ama asked me to deliver these.
translation.es: Por favor, la hermana Ama me pidió que le entregara esto.

translation.en: - Did you find anything? - No one seems to know her.
translation.es: - ¿Encontraste algo? - Parece que nadie la conoce.

translation.en: - Have you got everything? - No, I need to get one more thing.
translation.es: - ¿Tienes todo? - No, necesito una cosa más.

translation.en: Please help her carry the things.
translation.es: Por favor, ayúdale a cargar eso.

translation.en: Idiot, kill him, he's not dead!
He's not dead yet, kill him.
Animal, kill him, he's not dead...
Fool, he's still alive, kill him!
- Mother, good afternoon. - Good afternoon, my son.
translation.es: - Madre, buenas tardes. - Buenas tardes, hijo mío.
